page.title: 17HOUSES IN ROGERSTONE-2
page.content: I live in a large 4-bedroomed detached house.It was built with two garages but we now have only one as the other was converted into a playroom.We have also had an utility room built between the back door and the garage.In this we keep the freezer,washing machine and tumble drier. The kitchen is fairly big and has a small dining area in which we eat.The lounge and dining room are separated by sliding glass doors.In the lounge is a three-piece suite,a television and a video.Upstairs are two large bedrooms and two smaller ones with an airing cupboard. There is central heating and double glazing throughout the house.We also have a small garden planted with flowers and shrubs.
